member.name: T:MetadataBrowserControl.Module1
member.summary: This sample demonstrates how to view the Metadata of a Project item using the Pro API in a browser control with a transform applied to it. Note: Metadata of certain items such as system styles cannot be viewed.
member.remarks: 1. In Visual Studio click the Build menu. Then select Build Solution. 1. Click Start button to open ArcGIS Pro. 1. ArcGIS Pro will open. 1. Open any project file that contains project items such as Maps, toolboxs, databases with metadata. 1. In the Catalog pane, select any item that has metadata. 1. Select the Add-in tab and click the Metadata Transform viewer button. The Metadata Viewer dockpane will be displayed. 1. The dockpane will display the metadata of the project item selected in a browser control. 1. Note that a default transform located in the ArcGIS Pro installation folder is applied to display the metadata. `C:\Program Files\ArcGIS\Pro\Resources\Metadata\Stylesheets\XML.xsl` ![UI](Screenshots/MetadataViewer.png)
